entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 1:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -14.9°C

Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 43 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -24.6°C

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023
